heading: Are Flour Tortillas gluten free?
intro: This public analysis report explains the biggest gluten risks in Flour Tortillas and how to order more safely.

verdict.summary: Flour tortillas are typically made with wheat flour, which contains gluten, posing a significant risk for individuals with coeliac disease. Cross-contamination during preparation can also increase gluten exposure.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.

sections.title: Quick answer
sections.body: Flour Tortillas can vary by recipe, ingredients, and cross-contact controls in the kitchen.

sections.title: Common gluten risks
sections.body: Watch for hidden sources like soy sauce, malt flavoring, marinades, thickeners, and shared fryers.
